name: Merge Food
description:
Join the Merge Food! Merge and serve the tasty food to earn money while you expand your recipes collection and grow a restaurant empire across the globe.

Play this fast & fun cooking game anywhere, anytime, no internet needed after the initial install. Simply download the game and start cooking!

== Operate a Dinning Empire ==
• Cook a variety of dishes as you create a dinning empire
• From Bread, to Hot Dog, to Rib Eye Steak, to Salmon Sushi, to Pineapple Bun - merge and serve your way to the top of the food chain

== Merge a Variety of Dishes ==
• A variety of foodies from everywhere are waiting!
• Explore unique cuisines and wow customers, receive likes from them
• Looking for a cooking game with an expansive menu? Make hundreds fo dishes including Pizza, French Roast, Ramen, Shrimp Dumplings and more

== Cook in a World Trip ==
• Conquer the food event in Paris, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Barcelona & more!
• Satisfy exotic cravings with unique cuisine from each city
• Merge the high level dishes to unlock new cities

== Level up with Chefs and Internet Stars ==
• Boost the earnings by hiring the chefs
• Hire a local chef for free by collecting all the dishes in a city
• Mention the message from a internet star, get a free gift or earnings boost

== Enjoy Fast & Strategic Game Play ==
• Wanna make money? Let the waitresses to serve the dishes
• Wanna new dishes? Get the dishes back to merge into new ones
• MERGE or SERVE? Make your choice wisely

Merging is fun! Merge Food, the popular merge game from PeakX Games, combines a simple tap and play mechanic with exotic cuisine from many cities around the globe. Unlock new recipes, play in different food challenges and special events.

Download today and join the Merge Food!

Gold membership:
1. The new subscription package called Gold membership
2. Gold Membership offers a weekly subscription, you will have a 3 days FREE trail period, after this period you will be charged $4.99. After buying this subscription, you will unlock following features:
1) 150% speed of all dishes;
2) 2 extra waitresses;
3) 2 extra cooking tables;
4) 120% offline earnings;
5) remove pop-up ads;
6) get 15 gems everyday.
3. Subscription Notice:
·Payment will be charged to the store at confirmation of purchase
·Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
·Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
·Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
·Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
4. This is an Auto-renewable subscription (check the details in:http://www.peakxgames.com/autosub.html).
5. Privacy Policy (check the details in http://www.peakxgames.com/privacy.html).
6. Terms of Use(check the details in http://www.peakxgames.com/termsofuse.html).
